title: Meditation: Calling on Our Inner Bodhisattva (2020-07-01)
itunes:title: Meditation: Calling on Our Inner Bodhisattva
description: Meditation: Calling on Our Inner Bodhisattva (2020-07-01) - We each have within us the very source of wisdom and love. This meditation calls forward that essence, our awakening heart, so we can seek guidance and nurturing for the parts of us that need a healing attention.
